questions.question_text: "centralized" の意味はどれでしょう？
choices_text: Managed or controlled from one main place
questions.example_sentence: The company introduced a centralized system to manage office supply orders.
questions.explanation:
一元管理された
分散した
一時的な
少人数限定の

questions.question_text: "streamline" の意味はどれでしょう？
choices_text: To make a process more efficient and simpler
To increase the cost of operations
questions.example_sentence: The new platform is designed to streamline the purchasing process.
questions.explanation:
効率化する・簡素化する
遅らせる
規則をすべて廃止する
運用コストを増やす

questions.question_text: "procurement" の意味はどれでしょう？
choices_text: The process of obtaining supplies or services
questions.example_sentence: All requests must be submitted through the internal procurement portal.
questions.explanation:
調達・購入手続き
研修活動
監査業務
販売戦略

questions.question_text: "approval" の意味はどれでしょう？
questions.example_sentence: Orders above the spending limit require managerial approval.
questions.explanation:
承認・許可
説明文
エラーメッセージ
自動却下

questions.question_text: "justification" の意味はどれでしょう？
choices_text: A valid reason explaining why something is necessary
questions.example_sentence: Specialized equipment orders may require additional justification.
questions.explanation:
正当な理由・根拠
配送確認
月間予算上限
技術マニュアル
